dishes.name: Hakka Noodles
dishes.description: Savor the bold flavors of our perfectly stir-fried Hakka Noodles, tossed with fresh veggies and signature sauces.

dishes.name: Paneer Tikka
dishes.description: Smoky, spicy grilled paneer cubes marinated in yogurt and spices. A vegetarian delight!

dishes.name: Chicken Biryani
dishes.description: Aromatic basmati rice layered with spiced chicken and herbs. A royal Indian feast.

dishes.name: Burger
dishes.description: Juicy beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and our special sauce, served in a toasted bun.

dishes.name: Pasta Primavera
dishes.description: A colorful medley of seasonal vegetables tossed with pasta in a light garlic sauce.

dishes.name: Caesar Salad
dishes.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.

dishes.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
dishes.description: Indulge in our rich chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

dishes.name: Mango Lassi
dishes.description: A refreshing yogurt-based drink blended with ripe mangoes and a hint of cardamom.

dishes.name: Masala Chai
dishes.description: A traditional Indian spiced tea brewed with aromatic spices and milk.
